title: Nicely done
review:
Interesting story, very well executed drama. But, to me personally it was nothing spectacular. But it was far from boring as well.

I definitely can say that I enjoyed watching this movie.

title: Synopsis
review: Yukari has lived with her caring, medical researcher boyfriend Kippei for five years. One day, she is waiting for Kippei to come home when a police officer suddenly pays her a visit and informs her Kippei has collapsed from a brain hemorrhage. Furthermore, his occupation and his name are falsified.
